entry.title: Personalized Custom Photo Wedding Puzzle with 150 pieces 20x30 inches
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 79.99 - 94.99 (4 variants)

Do you love personalized puzzles?  Personalized Puzzles are a great way to relax and enjoy the company of friends and family. They’re also an amazing gift for any occasion!  Our Personalized Custom Photo Puzzle with 150 pieces is a Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle.  Featuring very vibrant colors on a thick board and printed in a professional matte finish, this puzzle is absolutely stunning.
Each piece in this Poster Size puzzle will measure approximately 2 x 2 inches, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20 x 30 inches! For ease of assembly, we'll even hand-number the back of the puzzle for a nominal fee.

This personalized photo puzzle makes an excellent wedding guest book or anniversary gift that can be enjoyed by all ages from 6 to 106! It's perfect for those who want something different than traditional guest books and provides fun for your guests.  You can read the personalized messages on each piece before assembling it into one large picture - so every time you put it together you'll see your guest's special words of love and encouragement.  Better yet, why not frame it and hang it where all can see, as this elegant puzzle should fit into a standard size frame.

Ordering has never been easier – just upload your favorite Engagement Photo and click “Add To Cart”.  We offer many payment options including the option to split your payment into 4 easy interest-free payments with Zazzle.

entry.title: Engagement or Anniversary Puzzle - Heart Shape
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 24.99 - 29.99 (2 variants)

Every special moment in time with a jigsaw puzzle.

Gather your most cherished photo memory and turn it into a high-quality photo.  If you are newly engaged or celebrating an anniversary, this is the perfect gift.  Piece every moment of your relationship together on a date night and celebrate!

This personalized custom made puzzle makes an incredible Anniversary gift idea and a very romantic Engagement idea.

This beautiful Heart Shaped Puzzle will measure approximately 12 x 10 inches when it is complete and has 88 irregularly shaped pieces, making this a challenge. A wonderful Valentine's present, Engagement puzzle, or special way to show your love!

*There may be slight variations in the photo on the lid and the puzzle, as we hand-cut the image for the box.

entry.title: Heart Shaped Custom Puzzle for Date Night fun.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 29.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

Our beautiful custom Heart-Shaped Puzzle with 80 irregularly shaped pieces,  and is so romantic.  This high-quality Heart Shaped Puzzle is so romantic and will bring smiles and fun times. 

Show your love how much they mean to you with this heart-shaped puzzle.   Great for marriage proposals!  Makes a wonderful puzzle for that special couple. The Heart Shape is so sweet and sentimental and makes for great date night fun!  This custom puzzle from your photo is an excellent Anniversary Present, Valentine's Day present, or Marriage Proposal. 

* Please be sure that your photo can be made into a heart shape.  It is recommended that the subjects in the photo are not covering the entire photo.  (We don't want to cut out anyone's head or feet!)  Landscape images work best.  *

There might be slight variations in the photo on the lid vs. the photo on the puzzle as we hand-cut the lid.

entry.title: Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle for Large Wedding Guest Lists - 200 Large Piece Poster Size Puzzle
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 82.99 - 97.99 (4 variants)

Personalized Picture Puzzle for Large Wedding Guest Book. Our Unique Wedding Guest Book Puzzle is absolutely HUGE and features 200 large pieces for your guests to sign. Each piece will measure approximately 2x1.5 inches when complete, with a finished size of the puzzle at approximately 20x30 inches! 

This is a Gigantic Poster Size Puzzle so please be sure to send us a high-resolution photo for best results. If purchasing a photo from your photographer, be sure to mention that you will be enlarging the photo to approximately 20x30 inches. We print what you send, so be sure to send a print-ready photo.

Recommendations:  We recommend having your photo numbered if it is similarly colored or patterned, as our pieces are similarly shaped and sized, but not exact.  We recommend using a medium point pen on our regular backing, which is a light color.

A fantastic buy, these Personalized Wedding Guest Book Puzzle encourage your guests to interact with each other while leaving you a lifetime memory. Looks amazing framed!

entry.title: Gift Card

Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

The PERFECT custom gift idea for every occasion, our high-quality 8x10 inch puzzle makes a great personalized Birthday, Anniversary, and any special occasion gift to let that special someone know that you're thinking of them.  It's a wonderful birthday gift for Mom or Mother's Day - or any day!

Type:

What better way to PROPOSE MARRIAGE to the one you love, show them how much they mean to you, or just say I Love You in a very personal way that won't break your budget.

TIPS ON PHOTO SUBMISSION:  Our Heart Shaped puzzle works well with photo's where the subject is set directly in the center, as we have to cut out the top, bottom and sides to form the Heart Shape.  We may add a border to the puzzle to compensate for the cut area, if necessary.

Order today... We can make them fast!

entry.title: Custom Puzzle With 30 Extra Large Puzzle Pieces Perfect for Young Children and Toddlers
entry.summary:

Type:

Our beautiful custom photo puzzle with Extra Large Puzzle Pieces make this puzzle the perfect puzzle for a unique and alternative Family Portrait.  Each extra-large 30 piece puzzle piece measures approximately 3 x 4 inches, making this custom puzzle easy to hold and maneuver.  Each piece has a large surface area and the finished size is approximately 16x20 inches when complete.  The pieces are easy to grab and hold for the young fingers.

Featuring generous-sized pieces, this puzzle is perfect for the Baby Shower, Family Portraits, Toddlers, and Special events.  The extra-large piece sizes make it easy to work with while providing the detail needed to preserve cherished memories. 
If you require a custom puzzle with fewer pieces, we also offer a beautiful 16 x 20-inch puzzle with 15 Pieces HERE. 
 
OPTIONS:  

HAND-NUMBERING:  We can hand-number the back of each puzzle piece for ease of assembly.  This is especially helpful if you order multiple puzzles, as we can hand-number in different colors.

RUSH OPTION:  When you select the RUSH option, we will move your order to the front of our queue and expedite the order.  This option is very important during holidays and during the pandemic, as orders can be backed up for weeks without this option.  Please be sure to select the proper shipping option for your timeline at the time of checkout.

Last-minute custom gift!  This custom puzzle is the Perfect Gift For Mom or Grandmom, or for that hard to buy for person. *Our 320 and 500 piece puzzles are recommended for the expert plus puzzler.  The puzzles feature pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge.  It is recommended that photos for these piece counts have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided.

Do you have questions about your photo resolution?  Check out our guide HERE.

entry.title: Personalized Photo Puzzle - YOU CHOOSE THE PIECE COUNT from 15 to 500 pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Custom Puzzle
Price: 44.99 - 51.99 (14 variants)

Everyone loves puzzles, especially custom photo puzzles.  Gather your most cherished photo memories and turn them into personalized photo puzzles.  We offer a wide variety of piece counts for every age and ability level.  

Here is the breakdown of our 16x20 inch puzzles:

  • Our 15 piece puzzle features extra-large puzzle pieces. Perfect for showing great detail.  Pieces vary but are approximately 4 x 5 inches each.
  • Our 30 piece is excellent for 3 to 5-year-old children who are getting their puzzling skills on.  This is a very versatile puzzle and is popular in our shop.
  • Our 63 piece is a really nice puzzle for anyone with large pieces and a size that is perfect for framing.  Pieces are large and easy to handle.
  • Our 104 piece puzzle is a very popular puzzle for the family portrait.  Each piece averages 1.5 x 2 inches, which is large.
  • *Our 320 piece puzzle is the most popular puzzle, as the pieces are approximately 1x1 inch and easily handled by puzzlers who have advanced skills.
  • *Our 500 piece is very challenging, featuring pieces that are very similar in shape and size but are not exact.  This puzzle is recommended for the expert, as it is very challenging! Not for the faint of heart.  Please choose a photo that is colorful and has a variety of textures.

**Our 320 and 500 piece puzzles are recommended for the expert plus puzzler.  The puzzles feature pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge.  It is recommended that photos for these piece counts have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided.

entry.title: Perfect Personalized Grandparent Gift Idea. Custom Photo Puzzle with 320 XL Pieces.
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type:
Price: 46.99 - 51.99 (2 variants)

We offer the perfect personalized photo puzzle gift for carefree Seniors, Grandparents, and even your In-Laws.  This 320 piece personalized puzzle features your most cherished memory of family history and is Made In America.  

This puzzle features Large Puzzle Pieces that are manageable for all hands while showing nice detail in the photo.  Each puzzle piece measures approximately 1 x 1 inch each, making them a little larger than the standard puzzle.  

Great for people who are visually impaired or need a little more to grasp onto.  With over three hundred pieces, this custom puzzle will keep you busy and is recommended for the expert puzzler, as it is similarly shaped and sized, but not exact!  A fan favorite, this sturdy and thick custom puzzle has been given as a Personalized Grandparent's gift idea, teacher gifts, and has unlimited uses.  Why not frame it for a great family portrait puzzle?

*It's important to note that our 320 piece puzzle is recommended for the expert puzzler.  This large custom puzzle features pieces that are similarly shaped, sized, and cut that present an additional challenge to even an expert who has puzzled for years.  It is recommended that your photos for this puzzle have a variety of colors and patterns.  Similarly colored/patterned photos should be avoided and high-resolution images are suggested.  Check out our blog post on Choosing A Photograph.
